description: Pre-filter multiple dimension tables (date + store) into separate CTEs before joining with fact table
Extract shared dimension filters (date, item, promotion) into CTEs when multiple channel CTEs (store/catalog/web) apply identical filters independently
Push filters from outer query into CTEs/subqueries to reduce intermediate result sizes
Consolidate multiple subqueries scanning the same table into a single CTE with conditional aggregates
Convert INTERSECT subquery pattern to multiple EXISTS clauses for better join planning
